descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Davis Bertans hits the 3-pointer to give the Mavericks the lead vs. the Celtics.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bertans knocks down the Mavs’ 3-pointer) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bertans knocks down the Mavs' 3-pointer

videos.description: Kevin Garnett loves what he sees as Jaylen Brown goes flying for the Cetlics' slam over Max Kleber.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Garnett goes wild as Brown ascends for the nasty dunk) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Garnett goes wild as Brown ascends for the nasty dunk

videos.description: Tatum kicks to Brown for a Celtics 3

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum kicks to Brown for a Celtics 3) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum kicks to Brown for a Celtics 3

videos.description: Finney-Smith grabs the lead for the Mavs with a corner 3

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Finney-Smith grabs the lead for the Mavs with a corner 3) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Finney-Smith grabs the lead for the Mavs with a corner 3

videos.description: Robert Williams III catches a lob from Derrick White and finishes with authority for the Celtics.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Time Lord skies for alley-oop slam) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Time Lord skies for alley-oop slam

videos.description: Dorian Finney-Smith gives the Mavs the lead with a shot from beyond the arc in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Finney-Smith delivers from downtown again for Dallas) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Finney-Smith delivers from downtown again for Dallas

videos.description: Luka Doncic finds a wide-open Spencer Dinwiddie for a go-ahead 3-pointer late in the fourth quarter for Dallas.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dinwiddie drains clutch 3 to put Mavs in front) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dinwiddie drains clutch 3 to put Mavs in front for good

videos.description: Jayson Tatum fails to answer a clutch Spencer Dinwiddie 3-pointer in a 95-92 win for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mavs best Celtics after Dinwiddie's clutch 3) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mavs best Celtics after Dinwiddie's clutch 3

videos.description: Kevin Garnett and Ray Allen embrace before the number five is hung in the rafters forever at TD Garden.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Misc (KG and Ray Allen have a moment during Garnett's jersey retirement) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: KG and Ray Allen have a moment during Garnett's jersey retirement
